scripts.docker: docker pull digitalasset/canton-open-source && docker run --rm -it digitalasset/canton-open-source --no-tty -C canton.participants.p.ledger-api.port=1234
scripts.sandbox: npm run build && cd src/Sandbox && daml start
scripts.test: npm run build && cd src/Test && daml test
scripts.lint: cd scripts && npm run lint && cd ../ui && npm run lint
scripts.lint:check: cd scripts && npm run lint && cd ../ui && npm run lint:check
